mapper.select: select distinct top 500 yh.id, yh.yhbh,yh.yhxm,yh.xqm,yh.ldh,yh.dyh,yh.hh, da.gdtime*gl.xgkw+da.zdtime*gl.xzkw+da.ddtime*gl.xdkw js, da.dgdtime*gl.dgkw,da.dzdtime*gl.dzkw,da.dddtime*gl.ddkw dyydl, da.fpbh,da.ms,yh.fpdz,yh.lxdh,yh.bz, da.dw,da.gdtime,da.zdtime,da.ddtime,da.dgdtime,da.dzdtime,da.dddtime, da.jf,da.sdwd,da.snwd,da.kg,da.bj,da.jj,da.time, yh.mj from k_data10 da, k_yhb1 yh, k_fpb2 fp, k_glb6 gl where yh.yhbh=da.yhbh and yh.fpdz=da.fpdz and da.fpbh=fp.fpbh and fp.xh=gl.xh
mapper.update:
update k_data10 set ms=#{ms}, dw=#{dw}, gdtime=#{gdtime}, zdtime=#{zdtime}, ddtime=#{ddtime}, dgdtime=#{dgdtime}, dzdtime=#{dzdtime}, dddtime=#{dddtime}, jf=#{jf}, sdwd=#{sdwd}, snwd=#{snwd}, kg=#{kg}, bj=#{bj}, jj=#{jj}, time=#{time},
where fpbh=#{fpbh}

update k_data10 set ms=#{ms}, dw=#{dw}, gdtime=#{gdtime}, zdtime=#{zdtime}, ddtime=#{ddtime}, dgdtime=#{dgdtime}, dzdtime=#{dzdtime}, dddtime=#{dddtime}, jf=#{jf}, sdwd=#{sdwd}, snwd=#{snwd}, kg=#{kg}, bj=#{bj}, jj=#{jj}, time=#{time}
where yhbh=#{yhbh} and fpdz=#{fpdz}
